Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Rhodes
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Cottage Grove, 76th, King Drive, and 75th due to, street blockage at 75th/Rhodes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Cottage Grove, 76th, King Drive, and 75th due to, street blockage at 75th/Rhodes.

Allow extra travel time.
